pullrequest.title: added better timeout logic to HaptixGUIPlugin

content.raw: Thanks for pointing that out. This PR is a fix for a bug that could be reproduced by inserting a sleep call at the end of `HaptixControlPlugin::Load`. However, after updating haptix_comm it appears I can no longer reproduce the bug. So I think you are correct in implying that the cause of the problem was in haptix_comm. I'm fine with declining this PR.
